ingredients.ingredient: 5 slices Dietz & Watson Originals Oven Roasted Turkey Breast
3 slices Dietz & Watson Originals Cheddar Cheese

cookingTips: Use a vegetable peeler to create long, thin cucumber strips for easy rolling
Pat cucumber slices dry to prevent dip from sliding
Assemble just before serving to maintain crispness
